guicomponents

Class GOptionGroup

  • java.lang.Object
    • guicomponents.GOptionGroup

  • public class GOptionGroup
extends Object
    This is used to group options together to provide single-selection from 2 or more GOption buttons.
    Author:
    Peter Lager

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GOptionGroup()
      Use this constructor to create an option group.
      GOptionGroup(PApplet theApplet)
      Deprecated.
